name: api-programming-languages
description: Unveiling the World of API Documentation Languages: A Deep Dive into JSON and XML

scripts.prepare: asciidoctor-revealjs --attribute revealjsdir=https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/npm/reveal.js@4.1.2 --require asciidoctor-kroki --attribute kroki-fetch-diagram=true -o public\index.html index.adoc && xcopy /s /e /y images public\images && xcopy /s /e /y css\main.css public
